Name of the attached file
The location where the attachment will be downloaded. Use null for default location.

member.summary: Saves the document and attaches it to a wiki page

The name of the page.

member.name: M:XWriter.AddinActions.StartProcess(System.String)
member.summary: Starts a new process. - If the file is executable then it will execute that file. - If the file file is resistered to be opened with another application then it will be opened with that application - If the file doesnt have an assigned application then Windows Explorer openes it's directory.
member.param: The full path and name of the file.

member.returns: True if the page is already opened. False otherwise.

The contant to be saved.
The wiki syntax of the saved page.
